title: Faith Hill-This Kiss,There You'll Be-Wushan
description:
"There You'll Be"

                               Single by Faith Hill

                      from the album Pearl Harbor Soundtrack

  
       Pearl Harbor is the soundtrack, on Warner Bros. Records, of the 2001 Academy Award-winning film Pearl Harbor starring Ben Affleck, Josh Hartnett, Kate Beckinsale, Cuba Gooding Jr. and Alec Baldwin. The original score was composed by Hans Zimmer.

       The album was nominated for the Golden Globe Award for Best Original Score. The song "There You'll Be" was nominated for the Academy Award and Golden Globe Award for Best Original Song.  

       "There You'll Be" is a song by Faith Hill, which became a hit single in 2001. Written by Diane Warren,The song was also featured on Hill's Greatest Hits album entitled The Hits.

     Released in May 2001, "There You'll Be" reached a peak of #10 on the Billboard Hot 100 in July 2001 due to strong airplay.

                         =============================

                                  "This Kiss" 

                             Single by Faith Hill

                             from the album Faith   

    "This Kiss" is a song sung by Faith Hill, released as the first single from her 1998 album Faith. Released on March 10, 1998, it became the album's most successful single, and brought Hill her first solo top ten hit on the U.S. pop chart, reaching number 7 on September 29, 1998 (after reaching the Top 40 on May 5). It also reached number 1 on the Billboard Country charts, number 3 on the U.S. Adult Contemporary charts, number 13 on the UK top 40 charts and number 4 on the Australian ARIA charts.

   "This Kiss" also became the soundtrack for the 1998 movie Practical Magic.

   Hill performed the song at the VH1 Divas Live 1999 show. The song also scored Hill numerous award nominations and winnings including Video Of The Year at the 1998 Country Music Awards ceremony.

                      =================================

                       ***There You'll Be.(DVD Rip)***


                         ***This Kiss.(Promo Only)***

                                   Enjoy!!!
